attacks.name: Loving Draw
attacks.effect: Draw cards until you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent has in his or her hand.

attacks.name: Sweet Temptation
attacks.effect: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with 1 of the Defending Pokémon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokémon to switch. This attack does 10 damage to the new Defending Pokémon.
